code: import axios from'axios';export var SERVER_URL='http://localhost:5500';export var API_URL="".concat(SERVER_URL,"/api");var $api=axios.create({withCredentials:true,baseURL:API_URL});$api.interceptors.request.use(function(config){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'));return config;});export default $api;
